channel.title: Functional on A fractal spectrum of tales
channel.description: Recent content in Functional on A fractal spectrum of tales

item.title: Piping with Swift
item.description: Lately I’ve been playing with Apple’s newborn Swift quite a lot. I have to say that I am really impressed, and except for few things that I hope will be smoothed in the next months (years?), I find Swift really enjoyable and readable. However, there is one feature that I really miss. Something that I daily use with slightly different syntaxes in Sh, Haskell, Julia and Elixir: the pipe! # Can we implement a kind of pipe in Swift?
